27

A  Hi, Michelle. It's Rona.

B  Oh, hello. How can I help?

A  Well, Hanran Solutions telephoned. They received our invoice for an order of scanners, but they say it's wrong. Did you print a hard copy of the original order form?

B  No, but I always save their order forms. Let me open the folder. Erm, what was the date on it?

A  The third of May.

B  That's strange. It isn't here. Sorry about that. One moment. Did they attach the document to an email?

A  Yes. I think they sent the email on the third.

B  OK, here's an email from Hanran Solutions on the third with an attachment.

A  That sounds good.

B  Yes, it's an order for twenty scanners.

A  Great. Can you forward the email to me?

B  Sure.
